message: I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire something you really want. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $9000. It's a fair price considering the value the product brings to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still thinking $8500 is a more reasonable price for the product. Would you be willing to consider this price?

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $8500. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, so I'll offer it to you for $9200. It's a fair price considering the value the product brings to you.
I understand you're trying to get a good price, but I'm still thinking $8500 is a fair price. I'm not willing to go any higher than that. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
